definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: pang (prop. writhing);—pl, [[חִירִים]] Is 13:8, Is 21:3; cstr. [[חִירֵי]] Is 21:3; sf. [[חִייַ]] Da 10:16, [[חִרֶיהָ]] 1Sa 4:19; —pangs of childbirth 1Sa 4:19, so (sim.) Is 21:3; and, of terror, Is 13:8 ( + [[חֲבָלִים]]), Is 21:3; in gen., of physical effects of mental distress Da 10:16.
